item.description:
I am excited to host Grace Rosen, a visiting Tantra teacher from Portland, Maine, who will be sharing this unique Active Dynamic Breathing Meditation with us.

Group experience of Peace & Oneness

90 minutes of synchronized breath, sound and movement melting into one consciousness.

Find your true inner rhythm and resonance with breathing, pulsing moving star of awareness, consciousness and intention.

Wear loose comfortable clothing

Donation: 20 limited to 20 people
7:30-9:30pm

Benefits Include~

* Breathing Awareness and Mastery

Balance in Brain Wave Activity

* Breath*Movement*Sound

Enjoy a deepening of energy chakras and meridian flows corresponding with the important glands and major organs of the physical body

* Communication and Intimacy Skills naturally develop and expand your ability to express and give the love that you are in your heart.

* Group work enhances and provides actual experiences of oneness and melting into one awareness, one breath and one heart beat:

A Breathing Tantric Star of Human Oneness.

Grace Rosen, M.C. & M.Ed. certified rebirther and tong ren therapist, spiritual counselor and taoist tantric artist and educator, author, breath & energy expert and sexual shamanic healer & visionary of Pure (source) energy integration.

With 22 year practice in breath, energy and creativity she offers national breathing stars for peace & oneness, energy mastery program for men, womenâ€™s empowerment & cultivating source energy, creativity salons for artists and writers, and transformative practices for sexual wounding integration via authentic shamanic energy and tantric principles.

Grace has been visiting Boston since 2000 offering individual and group experiences in the Ladies Room at Emerson College, in homes via Boston.Sex-Spirit.net & NewEnglandTantra.com Groups in Boston & Cambridge with Ipsalu instructor Glenn Hughes & in North Chelmsford with midwife Irene Meyers.

Grace loves living in Portland, Maine since relocating from the Southwest 4 years this June!

"Deep Relaxation is a golden key to true power in love" ngr

Grace Rosen, MC
207-775-7888
949-683-5433

Pure Energy Integration~ Transformative Energy Modalities

item.name: Breathing Tantric Stars
